title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
summary: Implement multi-factor authentication for secure user access to banking services.
description: Develop and configure a multi-factor authentication system to verify user identities using a combination of credentials such as passwords, one-time passcodes, and biometric authentication. Ensure compliance with industry security guidelines such as PCI DSS and GDPR. Include recovery mechanisms, device registration, and advanced session handling to prevent unauthorized access while maintaining ease of use.

title: Personalized Banking Dashboard
summary: Create a dynamic dashboard showing personalized user data, account details, and tailored product offerings.
description: Develop a centralized interface where customers can view real-time account balances, recent transactions, and recommended banking products based on eligibility. Ensure that dashboards dynamically adapt to user profiles. Focus on intuitive navigation, personalized insights, and seamless interaction, integrating secure data retrieval from the bank’s backend systems.

title: Responsive Portal User Interface
summary: Design and implement a responsive UI accessible across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
description: Build a responsive web interface adaptable to various screen sizes and devices to provide consistent experiences. Comply with accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1) to ensure usability for all customers. Ensure quick navigation, optimized performance, and intuitive layouts that adjust seamlessly to user devices while maintaining consistent designs and functionalities.

title: Online Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
summary: Digitize account opening and modification workflows to simplify and speed up customer onboarding.
description: Develop streamlined digital workflows for new account openings, product subscriptions, and modification requests. Automate data validation, identity verification (KYC), and approval routing. Integrate back-office approval processes and customer confirmation steps with minimal manual inputs. Provide transparent tracking and guided steps to ensure customer clarity throughout the process.

title: Save and Resume Application Functionality
summary: Allow users to save incomplete applications and continue them later from any device securely.
description: Implement secure session persistence that allows customers to temporarily save application progress for account opening or service modification. Data should be encrypted, auto-saved periodically, and accessible across multiple authenticated sessions. Enable session resumptions on re-login with notifications prompting users to complete pending tasks while maintaining data consistency.

title: Secure Document Upload and Management
summary: Enable digital submission of KYC and other documents through a secure upload channel.
description: Develop document upload capabilities to support KYC and service verification. Integrate real-time validation for acceptable formats and file sizes and enforce virus scanning before storage. Secure all uploads in encrypted storage with role-based access for administrative verification. Notify customers upon successful or failed uploads with clear instructions for corrections.

title: Real-Time Status Tracking and Notifications
summary: Provide real-time status updates for account opening and service requests with automated alerts.
description: Enable end-to-end tracking of user requests with dynamic status indicators on dashboards. Implement an event-driven notification system that sends automated email and SMS updates at key application milestones. Provide customers with configurable notification preferences and ensure accurate time-stamped updates for transparency and engagement.

title: Comprehensive Interaction Logs and History
summary: Record and display detailed customer interaction history for compliance and user reference.
description: Implement a secure audit and interaction logging system capturing all user activities, including logins, transactions, document uploads, and applications. Offer customers access to their recent activity while providing administrative visibility for compliance auditing. Protect logs using encryption, timestamp validation, and tamper-proof storage methods for regulatory adherence.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Enable seamless synchronization with the core banking system to ensure data consistency and accuracy.
description: Establish secure APIs and middleware for integration between the self-service portal and the bank’s core systems. Synchronize real-time customer data, account updates, and product availability. Implement data caching, error handling, and fallback mechanisms to support uninterrupted operations. Maintain complete consistency and traceability across all systems during high-traffic interactions.

title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
summary: Implement RBAC to restrict and control access based on user roles and authorizations.
description: Develop a robust access control framework defining permissions for customers, banking officers, and administrators. Enforce fine-grained access at both application and API levels. Allow administrators to manage roles dynamically, track changes over time, and generate audits. Ensure that all users can view and perform operations strictly aligned to their assigned access privileges.

title: Portal Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Create a dedicated database to ensure performance, reliability, and scalability of portal operations.
description: Develop an independent optimized database for handling the portal’s transactions, requests, and interaction histories. Utilize indexing, caching, and query optimization for scalability. Implement data encryption, backups, and replication mechanisms for fault tolerance. Ensure separation of portal operations from core banking processes to enhance response time and system resilience.
